original_text: Then those who were in the boat worshiped him, saying, “Truly you are the Son of God.”
korean_text: 배에 있는 사람들이 예수께 절하며 이르되 진실로 하나님의 아들이로소이다 하더라

sentences.original_text: Then those who were in the boat worshiped him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 배에 있던 사람들이 그를 경배하며

sentences.original_text: “Truly you are the Son of God.”
